blog.name: kayurka
blog.title: Come to the dark side we have pretty eyes

tags: i dont even think this is anti finn...more like apathy?
anyway im gonna tag this anti finn for filtering purposes
summary: anti finn ask anon asked:[[MORE]] (To any Finn fans who clicked through this cut just to get all outraged...I hope you’re...
body:
anti finn ask

anon asked:

(To any Finn fans who clicked through this cut just to get all outraged…I hope you’re satisfied ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ )

This shouldn’t even be a controversial ask that I have to hide behind a cut, but with the current state of the fandom… ◔_◔

Anon, you aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You don’t have to like or care about a fictional character if you don’t want to!

You aren’t a bad Reylo or a bad fan if you don’t care about Finn. If you’re not going around bashing Finn fans - as in real people - there’s nothing wrong with being apathetic towards Finn.

As for the whole antis/shippers thing, my feelings on Finn fans, antis and shippers are a bit more complicated than yours. But you’ll have to message me off anon if you want to know more, lmao.

reblog.comment:
anti finn ask

anon asked:

[[MORE]]

(To any Finn fans who clicked through this cut just to get all outraged…I hope you’re satisfied ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ )

This shouldn’t even be a controversial ask that I have to hide behind a cut, but with the current state of the fandom… ◔_◔

Anon, you aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You don’t have to like or care about a fictional character if you don’t want to!

You aren’t a bad Reylo or a bad fan if you don’t care about Finn. If you’re not going around bashing Finn fans - as in real people - there’s nothing wrong with being apathetic towards Finn.

As for the whole antis/shippers thing, my feelings on Finn fans, antis and shippers are a bit more complicated than yours. But you’ll have to message me off anon if you want to know more, lmao.

anti finn ask

[[MORE]]

(To any Finn fans who clicked through this cut just to get all outraged…I hope you’re satisfied ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ )

This shouldn’t even be a controversial ask that I have to hide behind a cut, but with the current state of the fandom… ◔_◔

Anon, you aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You don’t have to like or care about a fictional character if you don’t want to!

You aren’t a bad Reylo or a bad fan if you don’t care about Finn. If you’re not going around bashing Finn fans - as in real people - there’s nothing wrong with being apathetic towards Finn.

As for the whole antis/shippers thing, my feelings on Finn fans, antis and shippers are a bit more complicated than yours. But you’ll have to message me off anon if you want to know more, lmao.

(To any Finn fans who clicked through this cut just to get all outraged…I hope you’re satisfied ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ )

This shouldn’t even be a controversial ask that I have to hide behind a cut, but with the current state of the fandom… ◔_◔

Anon, you aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You aren’t obliged to care about Finn. You don’t have to like or care about a fictional character if you don’t want to!

You aren’t a bad Reylo or a bad fan if you don’t care about Finn. If you’re not going around bashing Finn fans - as in real people - there’s nothing wrong with being apathetic towards Finn.

As for the whole antis/shippers thing, my feelings on Finn fans, antis and shippers are a bit more complicated than yours. But you’ll have to message me off anon if you want to know more, lmao.

summary: I can't help but draw Finn in his new outfit from those leaked Ep IX BTS photos! This got me cautiously excited... I'm praying...
body:
I can’t help but draw Finn in his new outfit from those leaked Ep IX BTS photos! This got me cautiously excited… I’m praying so hard that he’ll get an awesome arc in the finale~

I may draw Poe and the others as soon as I can…(if I have time)

reblog.comment:
I can’t help but draw Finn in his new outfit from those leaked Ep IX BTS photos! This got me cautiously excited… I’m praying so hard that he’ll get an awesome arc in the finale~

I may draw Poe and the others as soon as I can…(if I have time)

trail.content_raw:
I can’t help but draw Finn in his new outfit from those leaked Ep IX BTS photos! This got me cautiously excited… I’m praying so hard that he’ll get an awesome arc in the finale~

I may draw Poe and the others as soon as I can…(if I have time)

blog.description: eulalia. she/her. arab-latina. swtcw fanatic. i love captain rex.

tags: i have a few ideas why he has so much more critcism
but that is another issue for later
summary: i understand and completely agree that windu made a shitty ass decision by sending twelve year old boba to a max security prison...
body: i understand and completely agree that windu made a shitty ass decision by sending twelve year old boba to a max security prison instead of providing the support he desperately needed, but to think he is worse than anakin??? windu is absolutely crucified by this fandom bc of his disagreements with anakin (ignoring canon content showing that he can and does respect some of his decision making), while people seem to wash away the fact that anakin / darth vader has slaughtered innocent people ruthlessly. i’m not going to pretend that windu is a perfect person because he isn’t, but he just receives so much unjustified criticism, especially in the way of glorifying anakin.

blog.name: iidigestive-readerii
blog.title: ii Digestive Reader ii
blog.description: (fanfiction.net username) ii Digestive Reader ii My content tag: Star Wars and...

summary: Star Wars and Captain Rex in the Rebellion
body:
Star Wars and Captain Rex in the Rebellion

Does anyone ever think about the fact that Rex thought Obi-Wan was dead for more than decade, even had it confirmed by Bail Organa - a man he probably met and trusted - to find out that it had been a lie?

Or that he ovboiusly in the Rebellion, and when he meets Luke Skywalker it’s like a knife to the gut because Anakin’s eyes are staring back at him, but this is clearly Senator Amidala’s son?

Or that he knew all these stories of Anakin and the Jedi, and didn’t know how to convey them to people? Especially Luke (and maybe Leia later?)

Or that he probably found out that Vader and Anakin one and the same, and broke down in tears because could life get any crueler?

Or meeting Hera’s little son and wondering that maybe, in a different universe, he got to see his generals (Obi-Wan, Anakin, Ahsoka) happy and settled down with the women he knew they loved? (Satine, Padmé, BarissYour Choice)

Or how if Ahsoka ever comes back from her buddy-cop mission with Sabine, he has to tell her that look, Skywalker’s. Alive and well. Can you believe it?

Or that he was rapidly aging, and didn’t live long enough to witness a semi-peaceful galaxy?

And that hurts
